name: Ux-model-graphs
tagline: An article about modeling human and machine state correspondences in ceremonies, protocols, applications, et c.
body:
An article about modeling human and machine state correspondences in ceremonies, protocols, applications, et c.

To build the .dot files, install graphviz:

$ sudo apt-get install graphviz

Once you have graphviz, just run make to make the PNG files:

$ make

You can also commit and push in 1 command:

$ make commit
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
